abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews New York Philharmonic concert, conducted by Christoph Eschenbach and featuring debut of violinist Baiba Skride, at David Geffen Hall.
lead_paragraph: The violinist and the New York Philharmonic perform the composer’s dark-hued Violin Concerto No. 2 and two sunny works by Dvorak.

headline.main: Review: Baiba Skride Wrestles Bartok’s Art of Darkness
headline.print_headline: Wrestling With Bartok’s Art of Darkness

snippet: The violinist and the New York Philharmonic perform the composer’s dark-hued Violin Concerto No. 2 and two sunny works by Dvorak.
